```{r}

names[fresh_senior]
```

```{r}
gravity <- function(G, m1, m2, r) {
  f <- (G*m1*m2) / (r^2)
  return (f)
}

gravity(9.8, 20, 34, 2)
```

```{r}
letters <- c("a", "k", "p")
check <- c("a", "n", "p", "r", "x")

in_letters <- c()
for (i in check) {
  for (l in letters) {
    if (i == l) {
      in_letters <- c(in_letters, i)
      break
    }
  }
}

in_letters

```
